messages.message:
We have setup an aihub sandbox to route via CDN.
details - https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C04TSMWLPAS/p1693933478563549

The exact same setup can be done for aihub-prod as well.
Requirements for prod rollout:
• testing completed on sandbox
• approvals if any to change aihub-prod
• deployment to aihub-prod with an additional advanced param 
```  "SAN_NAMES": <<chosen san name>>```
• manual setup of CDN distribution and R53 tweaks.
snapshot of performance metric for past 24 hours. Let me know if any questions on the numbers.

Based on Ashish's testing, the CDN seems to be working faster by about 30%. I haven't had a chance to check it in detail yet.

I don't think its deployed to prod yet, but that is ok for today. We'll notify users to be aware that first load will be a bit slow until we improve this.
